column1: Cloud Functions Microservices Frontend Edge Computing Distributed Systems Scalability NLP IoT Pull Request Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does. Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

column2: stay foolish. Automation Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it. Monitoring Cloud Functions Logging API I find that the harder I work
column3: the more luck I seem to have. The only way to do great work is to love what you do. JavaScript Big Data
